video.title: Águila Roja
video.synopsis: This series set in 17th-century Spain follows the adventures of a teacher who moonlights as a vigilante hero vowing to avenge his wife's murder.

episodes.synopsis: The life of Gonzalo, a schoolteacher, changes forever when his wife dies in his arms after being tortured. He swears vengeance as Águila Roja.
episodes.title: Águila Roja

episodes.synopsis: In their search for the Captain, Águila Roja and Sátur encounter one of the members of the lodge, the Count of Queiroz. Margarita is on the street.
episodes.title: El Conde de Queiroz

episodes.synopsis: Margarita is homeless on the street, but she has to return to Gonzalo’s house, and she finds out her nephew Alonso is gravely ill.
episodes.title: La fiesta de la Marquesa

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur follow a clue to a mysterious door. The Lodge want Águila Roja dead. The Commissioner jails innocents to set a trap for him.
episodes.title: La puerta misteriosa

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur follow the Lodge’s clue to the Lord of Alarcón. Sátur reunites with the love of his life, Estuarda, and tries to win her back.
episodes.title: Preparando a Alonso para luchar

episodes.synopsis: Following a lead with Agustín’s help, Águila Roja and Sátur find the entrance to the Lodge hideout. Alonso, fascinated, wants to be his shield bearer.
episodes.title: La elección de Gonzalo

episodes.synopsis: The Lodge burn their hideout, but not before Águila and Sátur find some symbols leading to a list of possible victims of the organization.
episodes.title: Gonzalo es torturado

episodes.synopsis: The Marquise hires a mysterious Oriental warrior to get rid of Águila Roja in the face of the Commissioner’s incompetence.
episodes.title: El guerrero oriental

episodes.synopsis: The neighborhood prepare for the King’s visit, and the Lodge see a chance to prepare an attack. The Commissioner puts a price on Águila Roja’s head.
episodes.title: Atentar contra el rey

episodes.synopsis: A series of murders of children terrorizes the neighborhood. Juan is arrested under suspicion while trying to save one of the victims.
episodes.title: La unión hace la fuerza

episodes.synopsis: The Commissioner and Águila Roja hunt the child killer still on the loose. The King’s curse remains as the Lodge and the Marquise praise his usurper.
episodes.title: Buscando al asesino de niños

episodes.synopsis: The candidate for King of the Lodge comes to the city, and the Marquise is accused of treason. The Commissioner is torn between his love and his duty.
episodes.title: La Marquesa, acusada de traición

episodes.synopsis: The Marquise, chosen by the Lodge and set up, has to try to kill the King. Gonzalo, now recovered, discovers the identity of the Lodge members.
episodes.title: Lucha a muerte entre Águila Roja y el Comisario

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo finds out the Commissioner is his brother, and with the help of his faithful shield bearer, he investigates his past. He has a plan to do so.
episodes.title: Gonzalo descubre un secreto de sus orígenes

episodes.synopsis: Gonzalo finds a new clue to his past: a medallion his mother mentions in a letter. Juan’s parents are against his marrying the commoner, Margarita.
episodes.title: Águila Roja continúa su búsqueda

episodes.synopsis: While looking for his mother’s medallion, Águila remembers his childhood. Alonso suspects his father is Águila Roja and decides to unmask him.
episodes.title: El secuestro de Margarita

episodes.synopsis: Margarita tries to escape from her captors. As Águila Roja and Sátur look for her, they discover a slave trading ring reaching the highest echelons.
episodes.title: Buscando a Margarita

episodes.synopsis: Estuarda is gravely ill after a smallpox outbreak, so Sátur has to take care of Gabi. The Marquise feels ill and suspects she might be pregnant.
episodes.title: ¿La Marquesa embarazada?

episodes.synopsis: The Marquise and the Cardinal receive a visit from the General Inquisitor, whom someone is trying to poison. The tombs are being desecrated.
episodes.title: Intento de asesinato en Palacio

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja crosses a cursed forest, a terrified Sátur in tow, to talk with the one who made the medallion. The Commissioner rescues the Marquise.
episodes.title: El bosque maldito

episodes.synopsis: A priest is bitten to death, and Águila Roja investigates the return of the unfaithful. The Marquise discovers her future husband’s true identity.
episodes.title: El medallón, pieza codiciada por el Cardenal

episodes.synopsis: A theatrical play comes to the village, and Sátur wants to act and impress his son, but the Commissioner is kidnapped during the show.
episodes.title: El accidente de Nuño

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja discovers who might be his other sibling and investigates bodies found in the woods. The Marquise anticipates the Commissioner’s attack.
episodes.title: El Comisario, atacado

episodes.synopsis: The goldsmith gets the two parts of the medallion and discovers the terrible secret it’s hiding. The Commissioner and Águila Roja race to save Irene.
episodes.title: Carreras de burros

episodes.synopsis: The Portuguese capture Juan’s battalion and demand a ransom from the Spanish King that gets stolen and never arrives. Juan and his men are in trouble.
episodes.title: Se anuncia una boda

episodes.synopsis: Sátur changes course. Águila Roja second-guesses the suicide mission. The Marquise secretly tries to stop the Commissioner and Irene’s wedding.
episodes.title: Gonzalo, a punto de abandonar su búsqueda

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja decides to quit seeking his origins. Hernán and Irene are about to wed, unaware they’re brother and sister. Lucrecia loses everything.
episodes.title: La noche de bodas

episodes.synopsis: As per his late father’s wishes, Nuño must join a seminary. The Commissioner challenges the Count of Lizana, the Marquise’s brother-in-law, to a duel.
episodes.title: La vida del héroe, en peligro

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja continues investigating his origins as Margarita becomes the target of a murderer terrorizing the area. All signs point to the innkeeper.
episodes.title: Difíciles momentos para la Marquesa

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja discovers the whereabouts of the last Montignac alive in Spain. Meanwhile, a plague of locusts shrouds the village’s fields in darkness.
episodes.title: Encargo real

episodes.synopsis: A solar eclipse ushers in strange phenomenon: a virgin crying blood. Some faithful warn of the end of the world. The streets are gripped with fear.
episodes.title: Propuesta de matrimonio

episodes.synopsis: The end of the world has come. Only Sátur knows of Margarita and Alonso’s refuge, but an accident keeps him from helping Águila Roja find his family.
episodes.title: Encerrada en el refugio

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur come to a castle after finding some old notes. The Marquise is excited, but not her son, with the chance to pose for Rembrandt.
episodes.title: Un misterioso castillo

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja tries to avoid the death of any more peasants. The Cardinal and the Commissioner use the Marquise’s ball to gain the papal nuncio’s favor.
episodes.title: Muertes y engaños

episodes.synopsis: The King prepares for the execution of Richard Blake, a famous pirate, after years of destroying Spanish galleons, but the Cardinal has other plans.
episodes.title: El pirata Richard Blake apresado

episodes.synopsis: Nuño awaits his execution for Beatriz’s rape, and Águila Roja tries to prove his innocence. Sátur has to save Águila from a venomous snake bite.
episodes.title: Nuño espera a su ejecución

episodes.synopsis: The King turns to the prayers of a famous abbess to try to save his son. Águila and Sátur find a sphere with inscriptions, a clue about his origins.
episodes.title: Felipe Próspero, gravemente enfermo

episodes.synopsis: If the Queen gives birth to a son, the King promises God there will be no war with Portugal. Cardinal Mendoza has a plan to make sure she has a son.
episodes.title: Bienvenida, Madre Isabel

episodes.synopsis: The plague hits the village and the Commissioner’s men arrest anyone with symptoms to stop its spread. Águila Roja is forced to take care of Sátur.
episodes.title: La peste asola la villa

episodes.synopsis: Juan and Eugenia’s wedding is in the works. Alonso rebels against his father’s authority. Cardinal Mendoza will stop at nothing to be the next Pope.
episodes.title: Convoy a Mongolia

episodes.synopsis: The Cardinal’s men kidnap children from the local orphanages to subject them to a cruel fate, and Águila Roja and Sátur have to discover the truth.
episodes.title: Los niños del hospicio

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur investigate the disappearance of several pregnant women who may be possessed by the Devil. Mariana causes problems at Gonzalo’s.
episodes.title: La confirmación de Nuño

episodes.synopsis: A group of indigenous people are on trial for rebellion. The King spares the life of a beautiful young girl, whom the Marquise must provide shelter.
episodes.title: La marquesa, celosa

episodes.synopsis: A young fencing instructor offers his services to the Marquise, who hires him to teach Nuño. Lucrecia’s life changes forever with his arrival.
episodes.title: El doble compromiso de Juan

episodes.synopsis: An old friend of Sátur’s comes to the village seeking fortune and barges in on one of the Commissioner’s missions. Águila Roja faces an old enemy.
episodes.title: Mateo llega a la villa buscando fortuna

episodes.synopsis: Sátur is kidnapped by someone very close who wants to hurt Águila Roja. The Marquise is going to Vienna, and the Commissioner demands she leave Nuño.
episodes.title: La Marquesa se marcha a Viena

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur investigate the murder of some scrivener monks. The cause of the massacre: texts that would shake the foundations of the church.
episodes.title: Encuentro entre Águila Roja y el padre Alejandro

episodes.synopsis: Being reunited with an old flame helps Águila Roja remember his time in China. Tension grows between Juan and Gonzalo as they try to save Margarita.
episodes.title: Reencuentro con un amor de juventud

episodes.synopsis: The Cardinal and the Commissioner turn the gold stolen from the king into urns. Águila Roja finds bodies in the woods and starts an investigation.
episodes.title: El Duque de Alba llega a la villa

episodes.synopsis: The Marquise’s jealousy leads to unexpected occurrences. The Commissioner is relieved of his duty, and Águila Roja has to save his brother.
episodes.title: El Comisario, relevado de su cargo

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur find a dismembered corpse near the harvest party. The Commissioner discovers his blindness was no accident and swears vengeance.
episodes.title: Un cadáver aparece despedazado

episodes.synopsis: The Commissioner submits to an operation on his eyes. Irene starts making her own decisions. Gonzalo and Sátur find out the Grail was at their home.
episodes.title: Águila Roja y Sátur, ante un nuevo misterio

episodes.synopsis: The King and the Cardinal try to avoid an international conflict. Águila Roja and Sátur find some ancient hot springs while seeking the Holy Grail.
episodes.title: El Rey intenta evitar un conflicto internacional

episodes.synopsis: A famous bullfighter is invited to the Marquise’s palace, and she offers him a deal. Águila Roja investigates a boy’s death, but Sátur isn’t helping.
episodes.title: Un famoso torero acude al palacio de la Marquesa

episodes.synopsis: Sátur witnesses an apparition of the Virgin Mary and the news draws people to the site to pray for miracles. Gonzalo has his doubts.
episodes.title: A Sátur se le aparece la Virgen María

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja is after those responsible for the killing of newborns. The Commissioner warns the Marquise no one must know she bears the King’s child.
episodes.title: Aparecen recién nacidos asesinados

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur are locked up and running out of air. Margarita, in pain over what happened with Juan, leaves the village to care for the needy.
episodes.title: Águila Roja y Satur quedan encerrados

episodes.synopsis: After being shot, Alonso lies unconscious in the woods. Gonzalo, worried, decides to look for him. Sagrario organizes a reception to introduce Jacobo.
episodes.title: Gonzalo se preocupa por su hijo

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja gets revenge against the guards who raped Mariana. Richard Blake returns for Mendoza, who turns to the Commissioner for protection.
episodes.title: Juan es conducido a una cárcel militar

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur find the location of La Boca del Diablo. Sagrario and Jacobo are still living a normal life, keeping Nuño’s kidnapping a secret.
episodes.title: Sagrario y Jacobo ocultan el secuestro de Nuño

episodes.synopsis: The King awaits the arrival of the Pope, so the Commissioner cleans the streets of prostitutes. Irene discovers a murder involving her husband.
episodes.title: Gonzalo y Margarita asisten a una boda

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur return to La Boca del Diablo, and a miner happens to see their faces. Sátur thinks they should kill him, but Gonzalo refuses.
episodes.title: La identidad de Águila Roja, al descubierto

episodes.synopsis: As Águila Roja tries to decipher the riddle of La Boca del Diablo, he suffers an accident. Sátur takes his master to the house of the mysterious Eva.
episodes.title: Gonzalo se siente atraído por Eva

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur find a new clue bringing them close to the treasure of the Templars. Sátur receives a coffin and the news his father is dead.
episodes.title: Lucha de gladiadores en honor del rey

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur find a key leading to a sinister trap. The King, knowing he can’t take on another war, tries to diffuse the situation.
episodes.title: El capitán Patrick se queda prendado de Margarita

episodes.synopsis: Someone tries to kill Gonzalo. Margarita is detained by English soldiers. Jacobo must renounce the Marquisate of Santanilla to protect his mother.
episodes.title: Margarita permanece secuestrada por el capitán Patrick

episodes.synopsis: Águila Roja and Sátur free a killer who holds valuable information. Sagrario is against his son’s wishes. The Commissioner looks for his missing wife.
episodes.title: Jacobo se enamora de Ana

episodes.synopsis: There’s a price on Gonzalo’s head, and if he doesn’t turn himself in, his son will die. Laura’s vengeance against Montignac approaches.
episodes.title: Gonzalo huye de la villa

episodes.synopsis: Margarita’s forced wedding is imminent, and Águila Roja, caught by the English, has no idea. The Commissioner must find the heir to the throne.
episodes.title: La llegada de la Marquesa
